PreparerFirmBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1: EDW B STEPHENSON & CO CPA'S CHARTERED

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: SUPPORT CANCER AND OTHER MEDICAL RESEARCH AS WELL AS TO PROVIDE SCHOLARSHIPS FOR DESERVING MEDICAL STUDENTS.
IRS990.MissionDescription: SUPPORT CANCER AND OTHER MEDICAL RESEARCH AS WELL AS TO PROVIDE SCHOLARSHIPS FOR DESERVING MEDICAL STUDENTS.
IRS990.Description: GRANTS AND FELLOWSHIPS TO MAJOR UNIVERSITIES MEDICAL RESEARCH PROGRAMS, AND SCHOLARSHIPS AWARDED TO DESERVING MEDICAL STUDENTS IN MAJOR UNIVERSITIES.

IRS990ScheduleA.FactsAndCircumstancesTest: THE H.L. SNYDER MEDICAL FOUNDATION MEETS THE FACTS AND CIRCUMSTANCES TEST. 1. PUBLIC SUPPORT WAS AT 18.31% IN 2009. ABOVE THE 10% BENCHMARK. 2. THE H.L. SNYDER MEDICAL FOUNDATION HAS AN ACTIVE AND BONAFIDE CONTINUOUS FUNDRAISING PROGRAM TO GAIN NEW PUBLIC SUPPORT. CONTINUOUS FUNDRAISING IS IN ACTION TO BROADEN SUPPORT FROM THE COMMUNITY. 3. BOARD MEMBERS REPRESENT BROAD PUBLIC INTEREST. THEY HAVE FIFTY-FIVE BOARD MEMBERS AS OF JUNE 30, 2010. 4. GRANTS AND FELLOWSHIPS TO MEDICAL RESEARCH PROGRAMS ARE AWARDED. THE RESEARCH PROGRAM OUTCOME, WOULD BENEFIT THE GENERAL PUBLIC. ADDITIONALLY, THE H.L. SNYDER MEDICAL FOUNDATION AWARDS SCHOLARSHIPS TO STUDENTS PURSUING EDUCATION IN THE MEDICAL FIELD. APPLICATIONS FOR SCHOLARSHIPS ARE ACCEPTED FROM THE PUBLIC. THE GENERAL PUBLIC HAS THE OPPORTUNITY FOR SCHOLARSHIPS.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: H.L. SNYDER MEDICAL FOUNDATION TO PROVIDE FUNDING FOR PRIMARILY MEDICAL RESEARCH RELATED TO CANCER AS WELL AS PROVIDE SCHOLARSHIPS FOR DESERVING MEDICAL STUDENTS.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: PROCEDURES FOR MONITORING THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS INSIDE THE UNITED STATES
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: UPDATES ON THE RESEARCH PERFORMED BY THE ORGANIZATIONS AWARDED RESEARCH GRANTS ARE REPORTED BACK TO THE H.L. SNYDER MEDICAL FOUNDATION ANNUALLY. THE RESEARCH COMMITTEE, COMPRISED OF 17 BOARD MEMBERS REVIEWS THE REPORT, AND MAKE RECCOMENDATIONS TO THE FULL BOARD. WITH EACH RESEARCH GRANT THERE IS AN AGREEMENT INDICATING PARAMETERS OF WHAT THE THE RESEARCH GRANT FUNDS MAY BE USED FOR. SCHOLARSHIPS FOR STUDENTS ARE PAID DIRECTLY TO THE UNIVERSITIES FOR TUITION. STUDENTS DO NOT RECEIVE THE FUNDS DIRECTLY. WITH SCHOLARSHIPS THERE IS A MINIMUM GRADE AVERAGE REQUIRED OF 3.0, AND THE STUDENT MUST BE ATTENDING AN ACCREDITED COLLEGE, AND BE A JUNIOR IN COLLEGE WORKING TOWARD A DEGREE IN THE MEDICAL AREA OF STUDY. GRANTS AWARDED FOR STUDENTS REQUIRE THAT THE STUDENT MUST BE AT LEAST A FULL TIME STUDENT.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: PAID PREPAPER COMPLETES RETURN. REVIEW OF COMPLETED RETURN MADE WITH PRESIDENT OF THE H.L. SNYDER MEDICAL FOUNDATION. PRIOR TO FILING THE 6/30/2010 BY THE EXTENDED DUE DATE, THE ADMINISTRATOR FOR THE H.L. SNYDER MEDICAL FOUNDATION WILL SEND AN EMAIL TO BOARD MEMBERS ON THE EXECUTIVE AND FINANCE COMMITTEE (APPROXIMATELY 20 BOARD MEMBERS) TO DETERMINE IF THEY WISH TO REVIEW THE FORM 990 BY PDF.
ANY SALARY ADJUSTMENTS FOR ADMINSTRATOR POSITION HELD BY TOYA RICE ARE APPROVED BY A COMMITTEE OF BOARD MEMBERS.
ANY SALARY ADJUSTMENTS FOR ADMINSTRATOR POSITION HELD BY TOYA RICE ARE REVIEWED BY A COMMITTEE OF BOARD MEMBERS. THIS IS THE ONLY PAID POSITION OF THE H.L. SNYDER MEDICAL FOUNDATION.

THE FORM 990 AND COMPILED FINANCIAL POSITION, AND THE STATEMENT OF ACTIVITIES, FUNCTIONAL EXPENSES, AND CASH FLOWS OF THE H.L. SNYDER MEDICAL FOUNDATION PREPARED BY AN EXTERNAL CPA FIRM ARE AVAILABLE FOR REVIEW FROM THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
